name: Persephone
subtitle: Queen of the Underworld, Goddess of Spring and Vegetation
description: Daughter of Demeter and Zeus, Persephone embodies the cycle of life, death, and rebirth. Abducted by Hades to become Queen of the Underworld, she spends half the year below with the dead and half above bringing spring's renewal, creating the seasons through her eternal journey between realms.
